'''Wart blocks''' are blocks that generate as part of [[huge fungi]] in the Nether. There are two variants, [[nether wart block]]s, a craftable variant found in [[crimson forest]]s, and [[warped wart block]]s, an uncraftable variant found in [[warped forest]]s.

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
{{breaking row|horizontal=1|Wart Block|sprite=all wart blocks|Hoe|Any|link=none}}

=== Natural generation ===
Each variant generates as part of [[huge fungi]] in their respective biomes.
{{block distribution|Nether Wart Block|Warped Wart Block}}

== Usage ==
=== Composting ===
Both blocks can be fed into a [[composter]] with an 85% chance of leveling up the pile.
